Subjects: love, nature of; sermons, verse in
_description: Seven Hindrances to Love, in sermon, ‘Panem de celo prestitisti eis’ by Franciscan Lawrence Bretoun — six short monorhyming lines in a Latin sermon

OxfMert248.Editions:
Pfander,  Homer Garrison. 
             “The Popular Sermon of the Medieval Friar in England.” 
         Diss. New York University, 1937: 50.

CULIi38.Transcription:
Þe fole nice gogelerÞe fole nice gagaler vel
                    kakelerÞe fole nice knokkerÞe wys a uice lokerÞe
                    wys a uise tonge keperÞe wys a uise hond holder
CULIi38.Note:
Alternates with Latin prose lines; and individual lines repeated ff.
                    70-71 interspersed with Latin prose commentary.
